name: 3D Platformer - Tutorial
description:
This is my 3D Platformer Project

Proposed Modifications:

1. Create a complete, interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level.

2. Add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression throughout the game. 

3. Modify the out-of-game menus in some significant and meaningful way.

Credits:

Created by Vinnie LaPenna
